verses.name: John 3:12
verses.text: If I have told you earthly things, and ye believe not, how shall ye believe, if I tell you of heavenly things?

verses.name: John 3:13
verses.text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven, but he that came down from heaven, even the Son of man which is in heaven.

verses.name: John 3:14
verses.text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, even so must the Son of man be lifted up:

verses.name: John 3:15
verses.text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have eternal life.
